titles.title: To prohibit the use of any Federal funds to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule entitled "Standards for the Growing, Harvesting, Packing, and Holding of Produce for Human Consumption".
To prohibit the use of any Federal funds to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule entitled "Standards for the Growing, Harvesting, Packing, and Holding of Produce for Human Consumption".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: Prohibits the use of any federal funds to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule entitled "Standards for the Growing, Harvesting, Packing, and Holding of Produce for Human Consumption" published by the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) on January 16, 2013, or any successor or substantially similar rule.
